location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Lewis Pelly, Nusseerabad [Nasīrābād] to Captain Philip Durham Henderson

mods.abstract: Letter regarding a question from Henderson about Elephants and that he had instructed the Political Agents to telegraph Henderson direct in response.The letter also refers to the issue of Kerowlee [Karauli] having claimed precedence of Kishenghur [ Kishangarh] and stating that the matter has been referred to Charles Umpherston Aitchison for resolution.
